content.rendered:
Recommended Broker

Vantage Markets

We proudly trade with and trust Vantage Markets

Choose the Broker We Trust

We personally trade with Vantage Markets, a top-tier, multi-asset CFD broker trusted by traders worldwide.

Enjoy tight spreads, lightning-fast execution, and access to MetaTrader 4 & 5, mobile trading, and flexible payment options.

Open your account through our RR referral link and get free access to our premium weekend watchlist – every single week!

Register

Why Vantage Is Our Broker of Choice

Regulations

Vantage Global Limited is fully authorized and regulated, ensuring secure and compliant trading.

Low Fees

Enjoy competitive pricing with tight spreads and a 50% welcome bonus for new traders.

Bonuses

Get access to exclusive promotions and trading bonuses. Spreads start from as low as 0.0 pips.

Support

Benefit from 24/5 multilingual customer support ready to assist you anytime.

Protection

Trade with peace of mind thanks to negative balance protection and risk management tools.

User-Friendly Platforms

Trade on MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5, or mobile with ease—perfect for beginners and advanced traders.

Why Register With Our Link?

Exclusive Weekly Watchlists
Get detailed analysis of the most promising pairs every weekend — perfect to plan a profitable week ahead.
Ongoing Support from Our Mentors
Our trading team is always here to help - answering your questions, guiding your trades, and offering mentorship when you need it.
Reliable Support from Vantage
Enjoy excellent customer service from Vantage for any account, funding, or platform issues - fast and friendly.

Frequently Asked Questions

Who is Vantage?

Vantage is a regulated, global, multi-asset broker offering clients access to a nimble and powerful service for trading CFDs on Forex, Commodities, Indices, Shares, and Cryptocurrencies.

Is Vantage Regulated?

Vantage Global Prime Pty Ltd is registered at Level 29, 31 Market St, Sydney, NSW 2000, Australia (ACN 157 768 566) and regulated by ASIC (AFSL No. 428901).

Vantage Global Limited is authorised and regulated by the VFSC under Section 4 of the Financial Dealers Licensing Act [CAP 70] (Reg. No. 700271) and registered at iCount Building, Kumul Highway, Port Vila, Vanuatu.

Vantage Markets (Pty) Ltd is an authorised Financial Service Provider (“FSP”) registered and regulated by the Financial Sector Conduct Authority (“FSCA”) of South Africa under license number 51268, and located at 164 Blaauwberg Road, Tableview, Cape Town, Western Cape 7441, South Africa.

Are the funds in my Vantage trading account safe?

Vantage holds all its client’s money in the segregated client trust accounts with top tier Australian banks. The money you deposit into your trading account is co-mingled with other clients’ money in our client trust account that is held separately from the company’s own funds.

Where is my money held?

Vantage holds client money in segregated trust accounts held with the AA rated National Australia Bank (NAB).

What platforms can I trade on with Vantage?

Under Vantage’s partnership with MetaQuotes, Vantage offers Forex, Commodities, Indices and Share CFDs on the industry-leading MetaTrader 4  and MetaTrader 5 platforms. The Vantage trading platform becomes even more powerful once SmartTrader Tools are installed and they are connected to deep liquidity pools via the custom made oneZero™ MT4 Bridge, increasing execution speed and price transparency for all clients.

Can I use a credit/debit card to deposit funds into my trading account?

We do allow credit/debit card deposit transactions.

If your card is 3D secure code verified, you can directly complete the transaction using your client portal.

Join Now
